General.Name: Octodec
General.Description: Octodec Investments Limited (Octodec or the company), its subsidiaries and associated company (the group) is a real estate investment trust (REIT) listed on the JSE Limited (JSE) with a diversified portfolio of 240 residential, retail, office and industrial properties situated in the major metropolitan areas of Tshwane and Johannesburg. The portfolio, including an equity-accounted joint venture, has a lettable area of 1 536 315m2 and is valued at R11.1 billion.
